accordion.about.title: About me
accordion.about.paragraph: Hi! I am Clement, a junior frontend developer from Nice, France. This is my Portfolio, which I use to showcase everything I develop. I specialize in React.js development with TypeScript with a intuitive design and attention to details.Why you might ask ?Well, scroll down and let me convince you.
